text: The name Horacio is found sporadically throughout all Latinamerica. == Historical Figures == *Horacio Quiroga, an Uruguayan author and writer. *Horacio Carochi, *Horacio Pagani (auto executive) (born 1955), Argentinian founder of Pagani Automobili S.p.A. *Horacio Pagani (sportswriter) (born 1948), Argentine sportswriter and sportscaster == Origin == The masculine name Horacio \ho-ra-cio\ is a variant of Horace.Baby Name Horacio - Origin and Meaning of Horacio ==See also== See also the similarly spelled name Horatio ==References== Category:Masculine given names
title: Horacio
